A never changing game with a terrible community, like the majority of the internet. They add small amount of content, but the core stays the same, and the game never really moves on to something different. After over 500 hours, I can safely say the majority of the community cannot handle any type of pressure and prefer to throw a temper tantrum, as if its going to change the situation.
